pageContext.claim: “Why should the people and taxpayers of America be bailing out poorly run states (like Illinois, as example) and cities, in all cases Democrat run and managed, when most of the other states are not looking for bailout help? I am open to discussing anything, but just asking?”
pageContext.analysis: Without evidence, Trump frequently claims states run by Democratic governors are poorly run, even though many blue states contribute more to the federal Treasury than they receive in federal benefits.
